title: (36163) Poio - 13A Avenida Porteliña
description: FabyMar laundry with three washing machines whose washing takes 35 minutes. Three large dryers. Machine to exchange bills for coins and parking at the door. Right next to it there are vending machines with coffee, snacks, nuts and chocolates, to make the wait more enjoyable.

title: (36163) Poio - 11B Camiño das Bocas
description: Poio municipal parking, very quiet, we spent the day and night quite a few times

title: (36163) Poio - 83 Lugar Lourido
description: Parking to go to the beach of Lourido (near Pontevedra). It is a car park but you can park on the length. Beautiful little beach. Wc and shower on the beach which is 50m. Cafeteria right next to the parking. One plant is opposite the other bank but does not change the translucent water.

title: (36163) Poio - 15 Rua Colon
description: Public parking place with about 25 spaces near the center 10 minutes walk

title: (36003) Pontevedra - 114 Rúa Rosalía de Castro
description:
Area marked as parking for a maximum of 24 hours with an area for emptying gray water and the possibility of filling with water if you bring the appropriate threaded connection, there is a tap
very wide and uncrowded area near the river

title: (36003) Pontevedra - 17 Avenida Marín
description: Parking near the city, without services, flat, ideal for visiting the city, a little noisy due to traffic. Overnight stay prohibited, signs posted at the entrance

title: (36995) - 31 4ª Travesia Seara
description: Modification of the location of the motorhome area to a field of grass and adjoining land, parking in battery and for 14 places. The maximum stay time is also modified, going to 24 hours instead of the previous 72 hours. The loading and unloading area is kept in the same place.

title: (36995) Poio - 3 Travesía Muiño
description: Day and night parking with water and picnic area. Next to monastery and church. Tree area with benches. Nice view.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 2 Rúa García Escudero
description: Small launderette.

title: (36995) - 35 4ª Travesia Seara
description: Site to unload gray and black water, and load water, next to it there is a motorhome parking lot and in the surroundings there is plenty of space to park. With green areas fenced for pets and the Praia da Seca.

title: (36005) Pontevedra - Paseo Domingo Fontán
description: Ideal for visiting the center, opposite the food market parking lot. Free with gorrilas.

title: (36001) Pontevedra - Nº 3 Rúa Javier Puig Llamas
title_short: (36001) Pontevedra - Nº 3 Rúa Javier Puig Llamas
description: Self-service laundry with Wi-Fi, next to supermarkets and various services.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 4 Rúa Padre Fernando Olmedo
description: Laundry, washing and drying.

title: (36156) Pontevedra - 9999 Rúa Alexandre Bóveda
description: Free parking near the center

title: (36002) Pontevedra - Avenida de Buenos Aires
description: New area of Pontevedra with filling and emptying service and 20 reserved places for a maximum of 72 hours a month. Caravans are also allowed. Wash up express laundry 100 meters away. The entrance is a bit complex because at the entrance of the street there is a sign of prohibited circulation

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 39 Rua Jose Malvar Figueroa
description: "Portosin" self-service laundry. 3 washing machines, 3 dryers 17kg. Clean and pleasant. Very close to air conditioning, you can walk.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 32 Avenida de Buenos Aires
description: Spectacular place to sleep right in a cove although you have to wait at the last minute of the day to arrive and make sure there is parking, a real luxury

title: (36005) Pontevedra - Campus Universitario da Xunqueira
description: University area next to the river 15 minutes from the historic center nice place and quiet the idea is that we park and be careful and clean without taking out many tables and chairs so that they do not end up regulating the area

title: (36993) Combarro - 3 Avenida Costa
description: We parked on this street to be able to visit Combarro, as there is not much parking available in the town.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 32 Avenida de Buenos Aires
description: Parking without slope next to the ac area for in case it is full, very quiet area to spend the night and close to the historic center of Pontevedra

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 64 Avenida de Bos Aires
description: The motorhome area being saturated, we spent the night parked at the side of the road with a view of the cable-stayed bridge. No particular during the night.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 64 Avenida de Buenos Aires
description: Near the official free parking space of the city of Pontevedra. New parking lot without installations. Dark and calm. On the edge of a large meadow for dog run. Within walking distance to the old town. Attention access above the pitch in the direction of the signposted parking lot.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 76 Avenida de Bos Aires
description: TRANSIT ROAD. MANY AC TOGETHER. We will spend the night here, very nice view of the river. area seems quiet

title: (36004) Pontevedra - 888 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: Parking place close to the city center, just 10 minutes walk. Not good for big size Caravans. It is quite and It is close to bars, restaurants and supermarkets.

title: (36143) Pontevedra - 39 Aldea Cabanas
description: Washing of motorhomes, campers and vans, there is a cafeteria if you want to have a coffee.

title: (36164) Pontevedra - 11 Rúa de Francia
description: Quiet parking area in park. Flat tarmac surface surrounded by grass and trees. A small tower in park gives panoramic views of town and river. Supermarket, bar, cafe and laundrette within a couple of minutes walk. Rubbish bin and water tap. Very quiet at night.

title: (36915) Marín - 82 Avenida de Ourense
description: Large car park, for groceries, laundromat and downtown stores. flat possibilities to spend the night.

title: (36915) Marín - 26C Rua Arealonga
description: Area with tables, shade and easy access from the ring road.

title: (36995) - 2 Camino A Escusa
description: Forest of secouyas. Fantastic views over the Ria de Pontevedra. Ideal place to rest and stroll in a forest of redwoods.

title: () Marín - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to the harbor with large squares

title: (36992) Pontevedra - 14 Camiño Bouciñas
description: In front of a beautiful and very quiet cove there are no services, the road is quite bumpy but you can get there safely. By motorhome I do not recommend it!!! The narrow path leads to a grassy area in front of the cove, very quiet night, you have a path to walk

title: (36915) Marín - 51 Urbanizacion Virgen del Carmen
description: Quiet place with shade, neighbors come to walk dogs and there are houses around it, but it is a quiet area

title: (36915) Marin - 148 Poblado Monte
description: Tight parking slots (campervan only) with view over Portocelo beach. There is a restaurant right next to it, very few cars passing by at night.

title: (36992) O Covelo - 31 Avenida Laño
description: Very quiet place at night. In the morning and at sunset people pass by walking. About 300m away there is a small beach bar where you can have a snack with various services around it. The entire beach with rubbish every 50m but unfortunately many people continue to throw their papers on the ground on the site.

title: (36192) Pontevedra - Unnamed Road
description: Golf parking and departure of a mountain bike circuit of 7km (easy). I went to ask the reception of golf, which is also Info VTT, if there was opportunity to spend the night on the parking to do the circuit in the morning, and allowed me without any problem.

title: (36911) Marín - Via Ciclista
description: Quiet place at the edge of the water. Motorhome of more than 6 m difficult but achievable access

title: (36992) Raxó - 2 Lugar Covelo
description: New taps with high pressure, ideal for filling jerrycans with water. The water seems drinkable but we are not sure.

title: (36992) Pontevedra - 21 EP-9214
description: Viewpoint with space for 3 campers. Although next to the road, very quiet. In the shade of the restored ruins you can rest and enjoy the view. Slightly sloping terrain. No trash can.

title: (36192) - 19 EP-9214
description: Some level parking spaces behind the stadium lonely place I would not stay there is my advice

title: (36158) Pontevedra - A Fracha
description: Picnic area A Fracha. Newly renovated. Untreated spring water. Hiking and mountain biking routes. You can continue up to 2 other viewpoints along a dirt track.

title: (36192) Armenteria - 3 Lugar a Caroi
description: Small car park, perfect for visiting the monastery and for mountain bike departures

title: (36192) Armenteira - 53B Lugar a Vilar
description: Pilgrims hostel parking. Always accessible. Great place to see the monastery. Bar O Comercio, potato omelette. Not leveled. Drinking water is available.

title: (36141) Vilaboa - 1 EP-0103
description: Good park to spend the day and night, there are picnic tables, a large lake and it is ideal to go with children, it also has a playground. There is also a bar and several beach bars. For the upper area you can go to the Cotorredondo viewpoint, where there is a spectacular view of the Ría de Vigo and part of the Ría de Pontevedra. Quite noisy at night, roadside. There is a high corner on a quieter plateau a little behind at 100m.

title: (36992) Raxó - Rúa Leopoldo Novoa Garcia
description: We parked to go to the seafood fair and we stayed there one night, it's a little uneven but looking for the place it looks pretty good, it's a quiet place and that they were at parties, 10 minutes to the beach, bars, restaurants.

title: (36969) Meaño - 16 Lugar Igrexa
description: Water point at the foot of the road with a small car park to stop. To the side is a hillside with grass and trees that provide shade. Ideal to make a stop.

title: (36966) Sanxenxo - 55 Lugar Granxa
description: Small parking on the beach in front of the shellfish packing plant. Ability to indent at the edge of the water. Very quiet night, we were alone in the parking lot. The beach is small but nice. Do not enter the address in the GPS because the address indicated is wrong. go directly through the GPS site

title: (36966) Sanjenjo - 66a PO-308
description: Easy access parking. Free. Maximum 24h. A 1 minute walk from the Bar La juicy with incredible views.

title: (36142) Vilaboa / Marín - Unnamed Road
description: Small corner roadside very quiet. Tall trees for the shade. In the direction of the viewpoint (barely higher). A beautiful view at sunset

title: (36151) Pontevedra - 38 PO-224
description: Quiet spot for sleeping near small children's games and picnic area / barbecue

title: (36151) Pontevedra - 38 PO-224
description: Parking at the reservoir at the sports facility. Quiet location, good for staying one night. All around a lot of forest, picnic area with playground on the other side of the road. Walking on the lake possible.

title: (36151) Pontevedra - 38 PO-224
description: At the edge of the lake and with possibility of having shade. No service. You can swim. Nice, but a little narrow path and beware of mosquitoes ... (in July)

title: (36120) Calvelo - Unnamed Road
description: River with a suspension bridge with beautiful pools where you can take a bath in the crystal clear water.

title: (36692) Barro - 42 Lugar Fonte de Curro
description: Gas station with emptying and filling of water

title: (36969) Lores - 24 Lugar Lores
description: Very large parking in Lores. Perfect to do the route of the mills of the Chanca river. We have not spent the night but there is no sign that prohibits it.

title: (36692) Barro - 22 Lugar Fonte de Curro
description: Small parking lot in which we spend the night without any problem, in front there is a furancho in which we eat octopus, saw, etc. rich and at a good price

title: (36151) Pontevedra - PO-223
description: Small low sides of a path at the edge of a clearing. calm with sun for the alarm clock. attention path a little off-road to access it. on the slope you need shims.

title: (36966) Areas - 36D Lugar Areas
description: Parking in a residential area on the edge of a beautiful beach and promenade on the coast. Public toilet and water available. Avoid the weekend because the locals are very present, so limited place

title: (36141) Vilaboa - 32 Lugar Paredes
description: Gas station with free public toilet, they are clean since they are also the cafeteria toilets. There is a shop and cafe.

title: (36141) - 26A Rua Paredes
description: Quiet area to spend the night next to a small beach and some marshes. There is a whole path that goes through the San Simon salt flats. we had a good night. There is also the official parking lot of Las Salinas but it has more people

title: (36151) Pontevedra - EP-0018
description: Place next to a very quiet road to spend a night. With natural water source.

title: (36636) Ribadumia - 16 Rúa Outeiral
description: Playground with area to park and rest. Drinking water source and beautiful view of a eucalyptus forest. Some bar or restaurant nearby. With hardly any traffic.

title: (36827) Ponte Caldelas - 1 Lugar Chan do Casal
title_short: (36827) Ponte Caldelas - 1 Lugar Chan do Casal
description: Picnic area with an open rural pool. The water is from the spring that makes the pool. You have to pass the cemetery

title: (36912) Marín - 2 Poblado Casas
description: Drinking water source

name: Lyoko Camper Park
title: (36190) Lyoko Camper Park
description:
Motorhome area located in Galicia (Pontevedra). The place is in a strategic location, with everything very close (beaches, towns, restaurants, etc...). Finally, we have all the necessary services for your motorhome and your family.

USE THE COORDINATES TO OBTAIN THE EXACT LOCATION.

title: (36690) Pontevedra - 3B Lugar Xunqueira
description: Beautiful site next to the river, dirt and asphalt parking, river beach showers, beach bar, public toilets (I think only open during the day).

title: (36194) Barro - 1 Lugar San Antoniño
description: Ground parking next to the Pazo da Crega. Area without services. In some areas there is a bit of unevenness. General road about 200 meters so some cars can be heard

title: (36637) Galicia - 29 Lugar Zacande
description: Zacande soccer field parking (Meis), quiet place to spend the night. Next to the town and the Pazo de La Saleta. Wide and easy access from the PO-300.

title: (36914) Miñán -
description: Very quiet place surrounded by nature. The nearby site is a mountain bike course with circuit, ramp etc... Super spot for mountain bike enthusiasts! Next to it there are tables, garbage cans and a water point. Locals come here.

title: (36690) Soutomaior - N-550
description: Car park with service area for all waters. Park close by and small beach beyond. Also, beach has toilets. Shops 10 min walk away.

title: (36690) Sotomayor - 45 N-550
description: Self-service laundry

title: (36914) Miñán - Unnamed Road
description: Water point next to a ranch. flows continuously. No faucet.

title: (36969) Meaño - 13 Aldea Abuín
description: Service station with shower service very well maintained, super clean and very well priced. Area to park, wash, empty black and gray water with easy access. Open every day from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. every day of the year. Very friendly and helpful staff.

title: (36912) Marín - 46B Poblado Casas
description: Free parking on land. Day Night. No services of any kind. Beware large motorhomes! I would not advise it, access is through narrow roads and its entrance is also narrow. Near the beach.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 17 Rua Barciela
description: Place with free water, accessible from local road, not from autostrada. Not for sleep.

title: (36914) Miñán -
description: Place with spectacular views of the Ría de Vigo. The road in poor condition, but you get there

title: (36969) Pedrouzos - Unnamed Road
description:
Asphalt and level parking in a recreational area, with picnic tables, sports facilities and a children's playground
It has no services and is a twenty-five minute walk from the center of Sanxenxo

title: (36960) Sanxenxo - 72 Rua San Xenxo
description: Large and free unpaved parking near the center has no services, it is only parking

title: (36960) Sanxenxo - 94 Rúa do Progreso
description: Laundry

title: (36979) O Vinquiño - AG-41, km 19
description: Petrol station with LPG!

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 1 Lugar Costal
description: Good place to stop or spend the night. Flat, with picnic tables, dumpster and store next to it.

title: (36960) Sanjenjo - 24a Lugar Vinquiño
description: Free water fountain, all the locals fill their bottles

title: (36636) Ribadumia - Rúa Portela
description: Place to stop for something to eat, short edge but quiet.

title: (36969) Sanxenxo - 24 PO-504
description: A Service area in the Service Station, free if fuel is recharged.

title: (36633) Cambados - 106 EP-9506
description: Esplanade of land on the banks of the Umia River, picnic area on the other side of the river, 3 km from Cambados, very quiet to spend the night

title: (36967) A Eirexe - 3 Rúa Ramón Cabanillas
description: Free parking. Very large, many seats. Semi-asphalted ground, completely level. Very calm. Supermarket, laundry, restaurants, bars, etc. It does not have loading and unloading of water. Perfect for a stop along the way

title: (36938) Bueu - 65 PO-551
description: Gas station with RV wash available

title: (36636) Ribadumia -
description: There are beautiful restored mills. There is parking in the area, without services.

name: Restaurante Luis
title: (36142) Restaurante Luis
description: We called this restaurant to see if we could park our motorhome. Upon arrival, the manager or owner was waiting for us with a place reserved for our 7.10mts. It is also a restaurant that is eaten by vice! Highly recommended. Call before you go.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 30B Lugar Pazos
description: Perfect water source to recharge

title: (36828) Ponte Caldelas - 86 Lugar Touron
description:
Car park isolated from the village, surrounded by nature, with a water point.
allows you to visit the petroglyph area (respect the stones, thank you!) or spend a quiet night.
no shade, good internet connection

title: (36960) Sanxenxo - 11 Rúa de Vigo
description: Parking with shade, 50 m from the beach of silgar.

title: (36938) A Fonte Alta - Unnamed Road
description: Large picnic area with garbage and plenty of space to park and eat, I suppose you can sleep. There are paths to go for a walk. Chans viewpoint nearby.

title: (36960) Sanxenxo - 51 PO-308
description: Burbullas Laundry, a good place to stop and clean clothes.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 8 Lugar Nores
description: Gas station with shower. Small but clean.

title: (36691) Comboa - 25A Rua Comboa
description: Some places to park near the somatre river ... Beach bar and restaurants in the city 10 min. Good atmosphere

title: (36967) Meaño - 10T Lugar Altamira
description: Os Pasales recreational area. 15 large parking spaces for vans, among shady trees. On the side of the area, next to the road, they can fit 2 AC parked in line. In the area there is a soccer field, paddle tennis court, 2 taps, stone tables and grills, benches, wastebaskets, and a wooden box with books to read (please put them back in their place). Gray discharge area a few meters next to the treatment plant.

title: (36957) Moaña - CF-402
description: Viewpoint parking. flat dirt terrain.

title: (36967) Meaño - 12 Aldea Altamira
description: Gray and black water drainage area only, in the Dena area nearby you have a place to rest, a playground, a river walk and two minutes from supermarkets and cafes. The bin doesn’t get emptied very often so please empty any rubbish with food waste elsewhere so as not to attract lots of flies.

title: (36633) A Bouciña - Unnamed Road
description: Nice, quiet place right on the river. Surrounded by nature.

title: (36979) Sanxenxo - 1 Barrio Pombal
description: Parking in front of the Baltar campsite behind the soccer field. Quiet place to sleep 100 m from the beach. Space for about five motorhomes. Monday and Thursday next to it there is a market that does not disturb and allows parking.

title: (36191) Porráns - 12
description: Parking at the beginning of the excursions; with the river, picnic area and playground. There is also a restaurant. Very quiet and mountain atmosphere. The ground is slightly sloping but bearable.

name: Camping Baltar Sanxenxo
title: (36979) Camping Baltar Sanxenxo
description: Camping Baltar

title: (36810) Redondela - 25 Escalinata do Meixoeiro
description: Small clearing where you can park up to three vehicles comfortably. Very quiet and surrounded by nature, on the night we spent we only saw a few people hiking. Access is through a track but any van will have no problem with it, even high volume.

title: () Meaño - Aldea Altamira
description: Outdoor parking between trees and pond, near a kind of museum. Access from a dirt road accessible to CC. Nice point of view and free dump station nearby (see on park4night map)

title: (36810) Redondela - 13 Camiño de Saramagoso
description: Near some petroglyphs and with the possibility of making routes through the mountain.

title: (36639) Cambados - Aldea o Facho
description: Ample parking space where Antea was a playground. Next to a soccer field and right by the sea. Quiet sleeping place under maple trees.

title: (36939) Bueu - 54 Estrada Agrelo
description: Paid parking although there is no barrier and does not put anything at the entrance . 1 minute from the beach. Very quiet area, with the possibility of shade (watch out for low branches), very level grassy ground. There are no showers, services in the beach bars and public next to the lifeguard. Suitable for any vehicle.

title: (36810) Redondela - 24 Camiño o Castro
description: It is a paved car park at the foot of Monte da Peneda, a lookout mountain with a small chapel where you can contemplate the Ría de Vigo and San Simón cove. The uphill road is paved but narrow.

title: (36938) Igrexario - 11 Lugar Igresario
description: Parking with beautiful views of the sea from in front of the Church of Santa María de Cela and the Restaurant Iglesario, where you can enjoy the cuisine of the area.

title: (36970) Sanxenxo - 22 Rua Areal
description: Laundry in the middle of the city. Parking a little above. Prices okay. Washing machines in different sizes from 7kg, 14kg and 17kg. There is also a dryer.

title: () Villanueva de Arosa - EP-9501
description: Esplanade next to the Umia River. River route departure. Easy access. Gas station, bar and bakery very close.

title: (36979) Sanxenxo - 2A Lugar Iglesia
description: Easy parking, quiet area. Well suited for one night.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 20 N-554
description: rest area equipped with tables and a small beach for swimming, near the N554. Not suitable for spending the night, very inclined, without toilet services, litter bins, garbage containers, showers...

title: (36826) - 18 Lugar Insua
description: Recreational area "Carreira Ancha". A very quiet place, with a picnic area and shade. Good views. Drinking water.

title: (36693) Cesantes - 18 Paseo da Praia
description: Dead-end well lit road along back of the beach.  Level parking spots.  We just fit our 6m van.  Two or three bars along the beach and a great bakery just up the hill.  Super views across the ria.  Can be windy and is a popular spot for kite surf.  Awesome playground.

title: (36691) Soutomaior - EP- 2908
description: There is a car park for any vehicle, the other dirt park is further away and difficult to enter, you could get the car buried in the gravel.

title: (36639) Sartaxes - 7 Lugar Sartages
description: Facing the sea, beautiful view, quiet, a beach shower but not working (covid). Van 10m from the water. Perfect for the night.

title: (36693) Redondela - 33 Paseo da Praia
description: Public parking next to the beach, very correct toilets and showers on the beach. Very calm.

name: Camping Playa Canelas
title: (36979) Camping Playa Canelas
description: Camping ideal for if you travel with children, very clean and complete services. Plots fairly fair if you travel with large AC but you end up getting it. Children's pools with slides, and for adults with hammocks and so on. They have many bungalows with families staying.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 3 Lugar Iglesario
description: Large parking lot across from the church and cemetery. Quiet road, nice view to the north.

title: (36691) Sotomayor - EP-2908
description: Free ground parking ideal for visiting the castle.

title: (36693) Redondela - 40 Paseo da Praia
description: Parking lot on the roadside, no problem with our 6.5 meter long van. Very clean public toilet and beach showers. Picnic benches are also available. We stood here for one night, very quiet and no problems.

title: (36979) Sanxenxo - 4 Barrio Canelas
description: Amazing place to park close to the beach. There are public toilets on the beach and that's it. There's not even a bin nearby to put the rubbish out. There are a few supermarkets 10 min walking, restaurants and bars. Arrive early or after 20h to make sure you'll get a spot.

title: (36693) Pontevedra - 12 Camiño Campos da Ribeira
description: Large field. Even when the public car parks by the beach are crowded, there is plenty of room for dozens of motorhomes. In addition, it is possible to stay the night like most occupants of the parking. The parking has direct access to the beach and children's games. No service on site, but a shower and a toilet on the beach.

title: (36693) Redondela - 44 Paseo Da Praia
description: public parking right on the beach and the kitespot. Very good public toilets and showers on the beach. Camping forbidden. Small vehicles only

title: (36616) Penaboi -
description:
Large river beach parking area. The access is very narrow (approximately 2.5m wide), so it is not recommended for AC. The place is super quiet, next to the river and surrounded by trees and lots of shade. Fit at least 10 vans. Please take care of the environment and avoid leaving rubbish.
Neighbourgs are not friendly with visitors.

name: Camping Cesantes
title: (36693) Camping Cesantes
description: Camping Cesantes

title: (36191) - 8 Lugar Monllo
description: Parking and quiet area to spend the night. Waterfalls and picnic area. Restaurant and cafeteria.

title: (36970) Sanxenxo - 32 Barrio Canelas
description: AUTOCAMPER SANXENXO. Private area for motorhomes Located 200 meters from Canelas beach and 2 km from the town of Portonovo. Lawn pitches with enough space to open the awning. Each plot has its own water and electricity connection. Common areas with outdoor tables, grills, sinks and sinks. Bathrooms, indoor and outdoor open showers. Two drain areas for black and gray water. Trampoline for children and animal park. The fishmonger comes in the morning. At the beach bar they have bread and pastries every morning, roast chickens and food. Very secure area with video surveillance. To book by phone or whatsapp

title: (36639) Cambados - 66 Lugar Facho
description: Quiet location, beach shower nearby, no service, no waves

title: (36191) - 3 Lugar a Maquieira
description: Large parking lot with shadows. There are restaurants, two hiking trails, public restrooms, garbage cans, and WELLS. Impressive waterfalls with bath area and jacuzzi pools. Lots of picnic tables. A lot of shade.

title: (36959) Moaña - PO-1102
description: Viewpoint, you can see the Vigo estuary, beautiful views, it has a lawn, benches and a fountain.

title: (36639) Cambados - 64 Lugar Facho
description: Good place to spend a night. Access by dirt road, motorhomes without problem.

title: (36639) Cambados - 55 Lugar Facho
description: Seaside. No beach fishing and stroll possible. quiet place we. no service.

title: (36191) Barro -
description: Superb point of view. You can park at the level of the church on a small vacant lot. away from the crowds of the waterfall a bit further down. absolute calm!

title: (36930) Bueu - 27 Rúa de Montero Ríos
description: Ample parking to visit the port area of Bueu. Without any service but close to stop in town.

title: (36820) Puentecaldelas - 11 PO-255
description: Laundry in town. Washing machines and drying machines.

title: (36639) Cambados - Unnamed Road
description: Praia de Correlo, on the shore of the river. Views to the island of La Toja. Plain, of land and next to a forest and vineyards.

title: (36939) Bueu - 75 Rúa de Montero Ríos
description: Hello, we have spent two nights in a street that is not a parking lot but it is super good with views of the beach, it has a portable battery on the beach itself and a shower with drinking water, we have changed the waters in the beach bar, the town It has a great promenade where you can walk with parks for children, a beautiful fishing village, with supermarkets, I would repeat since we have not had any problems, the beach in the mornings was empty

title: (36820) Ponte Caldelas - 10 Calle Jose Lopez Boullosa
title_short: (36820) Ponte Caldelas - 10 Calle Jose Lopez Boullosa
description: Campers region in Ponte Caldelas, allowed to spend the night in the entire city.

title: (36616) Pontevedra - Unnamed road
description: Parking next to the river Umia, called Natural Space "As Aceñas", a quiet place where they enter as 8 AC. Flat, quiet parking, with a walk along the river, and about 20m there is a table to eat. It has no service, it is quite clean.

title: (36630) Cambados - 1 Rúa Os Olmos
description: Laundry at a good price. You can't park in front but there are several car parks nearby.

Small open field very close to the beautiful Cambados Cemetery.
without services in a dead end street, very quiet to spend the night if you visit Cambados, near the center.

title: (36979) Sanxenxo - 8 PO-308
description: Parking next to the beach.  Wash basins Picnic zone.

title: (36630) Cambados - 21 Rúa Alameda de San Tomé

description: Mini beach in front and a spectacular sunset and the center one step away

title: (36979) Sanxenxo - 41 Lugar Montalvo 3
description: Parking area for very easy and close access to Montalvo beach, there is no type of signage that prohibits parking and/or staying overnight, we found it by luck since there was no room in the Sanxenxo area and we saw it as we passed, when we arrived around 1800 there were cars from beach users and around 2000 the parking lot was practically empty, we stayed with two ACs and a Camper, we slept very peacefully, a vehicle passing from time to time on the road, no there are no kind of services, not even rubbish bins (not even rubbish bins on the beach).

title: (36957) Moaña - Corredor do Morrazo
description: Next to the Castro de Montealegre with views of the estuary. It is a large esplanade of land with a little incline although there are some places where it is almost flat. there is a water source nearby, down the road, and several viewpoints that can be reached on foot. a place with beautiful views and to spend the night well.

title: (36630) Cambados - 35 Rúa Muelle Santo Tome
description: On the port, parked along it. Quiet place, no traffic.

title: (36937) Beluso - 37 Estrada Playa Beluso
description: Parking in the villages of Beloso. Supermarkets, pharmacy and bars very close. Beaches nearby. One behind the breakwater. Near Pontevedra.

title: (36630) Cambados - 28 PO-550
description: Automatic laundry

title: (36142) Santradán - N-554
description: Ground parking attached to the road with sea views. Some unevenness and noise from cars but it can be a good option to stop for lunch or go to spend the day at the beach that is a few meters away.

title: (36937) Bueu - 155 Rúa de Montero Ríos
description: We stopped by chance, great to go with children, park next door and beach next door. The town is super trankilo. The police very nice told us that in principle there are no problems if we do not park more than 24 hours

title: (36937) Bueu - 84 Rúa de Pazos Fontenla
description: Public car park next to the Bueu skatepark, 100 m from the port and all shops, bars, restaurants. Public toilets opposite. No shims needed. Spent the night, no ban reported.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 9 N-554
description: View of the oyster banquette of Vigo. Sandy beach for swimming. The street nearby is audible with a little noise! Stay overnight without problems! Slight slope unless you right on the front.

description: Opposite the church between Santiago de Compostela and Pondavera, perfect for a stopover before arriving in Portugal, very very quiet, beautiful unobstructed view between the vines, barely 1 minute from the N-550 large flat car park

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 2 Lugar Pontes
description: Drinking water fountain with two pipes. Water all year. It has an area to park the vehicle while you fill up. The locals fill their drums there

title: (36630) Cambados - Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
title_short: (36630) Cambados - Rúa Alameda de San Tomé

title: (36630) Cambados - 22 Avenida do Salnés
description: Day and night parking with supermarket nearby. You can walk to the center of town which has many monuments, squares and green areas to see. Do not leave the town without seeing the Fefiñanes square, the San Sadurniño tower and the Pastora mountain.

title: (36937) Bueu - 83 Rúa de Alexandre Bóvêda

title: (36937) O Cabalo - 81 Lugar O Cabalo
description: Public parking next to the football field. 5 minutes from Tulla beach. The site is quiet and illuminated. If there is a game or training, it is empty at 10:30 p.m. Place only to sleep if you have been late on the beach or you are going to embark to the Ons islands.

title: (36957) Moaña - 73 PO-551
description: Nice parking along the Ria de Vigo. Nice view of a suspended viaduct. Small beach nearby where you can swim.

title: (36634) Corvillón - 2 Lugar Cabana
description: Spectacular gas station, shower service and bathrooms better than in a spa, amazing. The shower costs 4 euros for 10 minutes, the best we have ever had. In addition, the bathrooms are on the same level, impressive. Very friendly and helpful staff. You can also refuel and wash the vehicle. A 10 for those of us on the road. Service until 10:00 p.m.

title: (36939) Bueu - 79 Rua de Ramon Bares
description: Dirt parking next to the institutes.

title: (36937) Bueu - Unnamed Road
description: Private parking on Tulla beach. good condition Narrow road access. Beach allows dogs. 2 beach bars to snack and drink. The beach is worth it.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 23 Lugar Aios
description: Nude beach parking. Toilets in high season. During the day very busy with cars and it's sloping but good spots to be found for a night. Absolutely not for big campers 6 meter max. Restaurant on site.

title: (36939) Bueu - 91C Rua de Ramon Bares
description:
Best drinking water you will ever find
very good quality drinking water

description:
MOTORHOME AREA
place on the beach, magnificent views of the Ons and Cies Islands.
Ample shaded spaces.
Two toilets with hot shower, sinks.
............................
Stay 24 hours.

title: (36991) Isla de La Toja - s/n Paseo do Mar
title_short: (36991) Isla de La Toja - s/n Paseo do Mar
description: Parking next to the Louxo hotel. It's not much, but staying overnight if you're in the area is fine.

title: (36630) Cambados - 56-58 Rúa Pombal
description: A good place to park and park if Cambados is market day or are parties because the port parking will be closed to traffic and full of stands or booths. This place is made of asphalt and compacted earth, level and with shade; since it has a grove that protects it. It is very quiet and is next to the sports center. A small bike path starts here and it is very close to Tragove tide mill

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - Rúa da Praia de Bascuas
title_short: (36990) Sanxenxo - Rúa da Praia de Bascuas
description: Beautiful place with incredible views of the Ons Islands .. next to the Bascuas beach (fantastic nudist beach) .. Good place to park ..

title: (36991) O Grove - 1 Rua Carreiro
description: Parking without restrictions in front of the golf club. Suitable for campers under 6 meters. Convenient to visit Grobits park quickly.  Continue towards the end of the island authorized parking

title: (36939) Bueu - 71 Lugar O Valado
description: We went in the middle of the Sonrias 2023 festival and since there was almost no space, we ended up in the soccer field parking lot. Quiet to spend the night but 20 min walk from the port

title: () - Domaio,
description: Location in Vigo right at the foot of the Vigo estuary with spectacular views and a super quiet location with a cove beach next to it and grass a bit unprotected from the wind for that reason but fine. Overnight prohibited.

title: (36991) O Grove - Paseo do Mar
description: Parking with lots of space, there are parking lots for buses that can use large motorhomes, there are no services but these are next to where you take the tourist train and 5 minutes walk to the Toja Museum.

name: Área de autocaravanas Camper Cambados
title: (36634) Área de autocaravanas Camper Cambados
description: Motorhome area in Cambados. Payment by card and phone only. Possibility of reservation subject to availability. Located in the capital of Albariño wine and just a 10-minute walk along the coastal path from the Monumental and Restoration Area of Cambados. The area is in a quiet area next to a pond with a mill and on an avenue full of services such as 24-hour supermarkets, gas stations and 24-hour laundries. Water and sewage are included in the price. There are also some pitches with electricity. The area is under video surveillance with a 24 hour recording.

title: (36990) Sangenjo - 176 PO-308
description: Free car park directly overlooking the beach. A few restaurants close by. No services. Ground is paved but not level. Amazing view.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 176 PO-308
description: Near the beach, motorhome parking with all amenities.

title: (36957) Moaña - Estrada Cangas-Vilaboa, 114
description: Perfect place to stop for lunch and enjoy the best views of the Vigo and Rande bridge. Bakeries, bars, pharmacy, supermarket and dispensary.

title: (36812) Redondela - 2 Camiño Praia de Rande
description: Picnic table area next to the estuary. Good parking. Narrow access only for vans.

title: (36121) Cotobade - Unnamed Road
description: A place in the middle of nature that helped us to make a stop on the way and visit the San Xusto baths that are further down on the banks of the river. There was a picnic area upstairs. It was very good.

title: (36693) Redondela - 38 Avenida Mendiño
description: Large parking area 10 minutes from the center on foot. Sandy soil and with some unevenness. Perfect to spend the day in Rondela.

title: (36937) Bueu - EP-1302
description: Small parking lot on the beach, for swimming. Forbidden to stay overnight.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 95 PO-308
description: Public and free parking in access to Praia Maior. Without services Unleveled and areas with sand. Very busy during the day. Good beach and very useful for overnight in the Sanxenxo area.

title: () Moaña - 63 Avenida Porta do Sol
description: Parking along the road. Quiet for one night.No ban.Resto playground.Promateurs, dogs and sportsmen nearby. A lot of passage during the day but quite quiet at night.

title: (36991) O Grove - 1 Rúa Don Pedro
description: Area under pine forest with lots of shade next to the bridge. Perfect for spending the day. At the entrance there is a sign prohibited except shellfish and guards, but in truth it is the parking lot of the nearby beach bar and the beach.

title: (36800) Redondela - N-550
description: Services for motorhomes at the Repsol de Redondela service station on the N-550 road towards Pontevedra or towards Vigo. There are services in both directions of traffic. They have a food store, baked bread, AdBlue and butane bottles.

title: (36990) Sanjenjo - PO-308
description: Space with grass and camping tables for AC. In front of La Lanzada beach, there is a parking lot at the top for cars and a little further on is the entrance for this space. It does not have the views of the top, but it is quieter.

title: (36990) - 173 Lugar a Lanzada
description: Huge parking for people who go to the huge beach of La Lanzada. No sign. Today we will sleep here together. 6 AC more.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 134 Calle a Lanzada
description: Large lawn parking and next to a beach bar and the sea. From 22:00 to 09:00 is prohibited.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - PO-308
description: Spectacular place to spend the day. Camping or spending the night is not allowed by order of SEPRONA, the Civil Guard passes by and if you have chairs or a table outside, they will fine you directly because you can only park. And if you stay overnight the Civil Guard will wake you up in the middle of the night with the gift of a fine and have to leave in the middle of the night

name: Camping Cachadelos
